title: SLAB SERIF ID PLEASE HELP!!
content:
i would like to know the name of this font PLEASE

originally i thought it was Chaparral Pro, but its not if that helps. lol

thankksss

author: scrammit

comments.content: i've found that its very similar to The Sans however the M is not sloped the the R is different also.
